Tarkan Versus the Vikings () is a 1971 Turkish action film, directed by Ertem EÄŸilmez based on a comic strip by Sezgin Burak, starring Kartal Tibet as  fictional Hunnic warrior Tarkan, who vows revenge against Viking raiders after they ambush him and leave him for dead. The film, which went on nationwide general release on , was the fifth in a series of seven films based on the comic strip character.
Tarkan Versus the Vikings was released in the US in 2005 by Mondo Macabro on a double-bill DVD with The Deathless Devil.
